title: 16-year-old shot early today in West Toledo
content:
A 16-year-old was shot early today in West Toledo.
Officers responded shortly after midnight to a gunshot victim at Willys Parkway and Hillcrest Avenue. Kveon Giles of Toledo said he was walking in the area when someone from a passing vehicle shot him in the right arm, according to Toledo police.
Investigators don’t know specifically where the shooting occurred.
The victim was taken to ProMedica Toledo Hospital. A spokesman said additional patient information was not available.
There have been 157 gunshot victims this year in Toledo, according to a review of police records.
